title: Width / Height < 255 for camera causes slowdown with real_time_update_rate = 0

content.raw: When using a camera image width and height value less than 255 and real_time_update_rate of 0 the simulator ticks far slower than if you use any values greater than 255. I suspect this has to do with the param loader  inferring the width and height are ints and then they are used together in a calculation somewhere that causes the result to be an int instead of a long but I have no idea.
